Far too many people bitching about the content in most femdom pegging/malesub doujins. I would wager money that you have at least one rape/hypnosis tagged doujin where the girl(s) get raped this is different in what way the guy gets raped and that's suddenly not okay; lol okay buddy!.
If that's the case *gun loading sounds* I should earn points in a bloody way.

I love how any comment section below a femdom doujin always needs to have that one dumbass writing a whole ass college thesis about the dangers of feminism and its relation to some random political ideology. Definitely comes across as someone who is well-informed about these topics and incredibly secure in their own identity and beliefs.

@Akillion According to Einstein (in his essay _Why socialism?_)  "The real purpose of socialism is precisely to overcome and advance beyond the predatory phase of human development."  Modern feminism happened to be derived from socialism, both are counter-punches against exploitation.   Because women were exploited more than anyone  in the caveman days, and have finally managed to be allowed to vote, etc.- they are going to take a victory lap or two. Don't confuse that with Femdom- which is 95% a masochist male fantasy. In general women prefer the role of masochist do to cultural expectations,  wanting to be desired by strong (and likely sadistic) men. Some of that might be hardwired, but that is controversial.

Vander, its probably because it turns the authors and many readers on.  Now why it turns us on is another question altogether.  Many of us have had girlfriends who played with our butts, and really liked it.  Those who have tried something like that noticed that it feels even better than having our cocks played with, although its harder to cum with anal play.  I'm not going to write an essay about why some men are masochist.. at least not here.
Points bs why does most of the fked up femdom comics go with bs points and just shove anything when the guy's level/points goes 0 jeez

This piece is well crafted and nicely drawn, without a doubt. But I cannot shake the feeling of dread that a world like this one could come into being. For that, I cannot, in good faith, say that I enjoyed this doujin. I doubt it's even possible, but the thought of it.. Makes me sick, honestly. This would be a pretty easy 10/10 if there was a bit more consent involved, because then it would just be some naughty bedroom fun and not a horrible dystopia.

In a world were all women act like Amber Herd.

I Would not like to live in.

@Ianuda Keck, let's not pass off your personal philosophical thoughts on the couch as some real fact. I mean, "let me tell you a terrible secret" sounds comical, not only is it based on a rather superficial knowledge of history and Christianity in General, but also the conclusions are very strange and one-sided. Feminism is a natural process in the development of capitalism and communism in General (in communism it came earlier) everything is simple in economic considerations. As for masochism, there are many reasons for masochism, ranging from fatigue due to excessive responsibility, to childhood injuries.

@LIFE-IS-A-CHEMICAL-REACTION An interesting analysis, although to me, femdom is not in humiliation but in control. And it's not connected to my real life - I vaguely remember an episode where I got absolutely by chance locked in a gas chamber in a video game and I got excited - and I was like 5 (without any abuse before or since). Now, I could rationalize this loss of control with the general submission to life instead of taking my own life in a philosophical act of free will, of suicide... Femdom = life. (Christian self-flagellation is actual self-hatred, self-mutilation, very gay and very pathetic.)

8/10 great sex scenes, amazing art and weak but interesting plot. U normiefags can crying like a little baby virgin. Femdom isnt cuckoldry or simping.

@Ianuda That is very interesting. I had never thought of that.. the whole horse-hair thing and the self-whipping, etc. perfectly matches the masochistic male trope. I think nowadays, many guys without a Christian background also indulge in masochism- the causal link isn't clear. What seems more pertinent to me is that some shy and less successful / less athletic types realize they will never EVER sleep with a girl they consider a 10- and the result is they despair and internally look for symbolism that matches their subconscious feeling that they have been victimized. Masochism is a sort of magic, in a way, lead to gold or pain to pleasure. What else could make degradation and subjugation super-exciting to a guy?  It is like a defense mechanism but rather than making a thing slightly more tolerable, it makes it desirable.  Perhaps women were the first to discover masochism back in the caveman days when having a hyper-agro husband would be more survivable, but it also meant abuse.

@otomono I will tell you a terrible secret - the whole phenomenon of feminism is but a reflection of the European man's self-flagellation born out of Christian axiology where weakness = good. Women only do what men allow them to - and Western men have been cucks for at least 300 years (when they stopped using public torture).
